zls.max_detail_length.description: The detail field of completions is truncated to be no longer than this (in bytes).

zls.global_cache_path.description: Path to the global cache directory

zls.include_at_in_builtins.description: Whether the @ sign should be part of the completion of builtins

zls.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

zls.inlay_hints_exclude_single_argument.description: don't show inlay hints for single argument calls

zls.inlay_hints_show_builtin.description: enable inlay hints for builtin functions

zls.builtin_path.description: Path to "builtin;" useful for debugging, automatically set if let null

zls.debugLog.description: Enable debug logging in release builds of zls.

zls.enable_import_embedfile_argument_com.description: Whether to enable import/embedFile argument completions (NOTE: these are triggered manually as updating the autotrigger characters may cause issues)

zls.operator_completions.description: Whether to enable `*` and `?` operators in completion lists

zls.warn_style.description: Whether to pay attention to style issues. This is opt-in since the style guide explicitly states that the style info provided is a guideline only.

zls.skip_std_references.description: Skips references to std. This will improve lookup speeds. Going to definition however will continue to work

zls.zig_exe_path.description: Zig executable path used to run the custom build runner. May be used to find a lib path if none is provided.

zls.check_for_update.description: Whether to automatically check for new updates
